summary: EL CHAPO - THE BOSS OF MEMES - A Mexican drug lord with swagger that even made the most stylish of rappers jealous. His Sinaloa Cartel was the real deal, dealing with everything from cocaine to memes. This guy knew how to run a business, and his empire made him filthy rich. Rumor has it that El Chapo hid his money all over the place. People are still searching for his secret stashes.
